reviewText: My son has CP we put this on for him at night and it totally relaxes him.  The CD is nice for meditation.
Love the scenery, but the music is a little down, would love a little more upbeat Hawaiian music, so I use my own cd to watch the pictures.
My favorite DVD, I bought two.
I love the ocean.  Pretty music.
Relax visually and with soft sounds.
This is very relaxing.  I often use it to fall asleep. The music is so soothing and it plays for hrs with no assist. Well worth it.
Instead of violence and crimes this ocean paradise brings calm and beauty into the home. It is a fascinating video to watch.
VERY SOOTHING, BETTER TV, RELAXING AND CALMING WONDERDFUL AND PEACEFUL.I WOULD RECOMMEND IT FRIENDS WHO ARE BORED OF TV.GREAT COLOR.

My Grand-daughters like playing  "Submarine" -- they sit on my lap and we watch the tropical reef DVD on my portable DVD player-- lots of fun and educational as well. They especially enjoy the music that accompanies the video.

Serene and relaxing. Excellent photography.
I put this on when there is nothing on TV or I am just working around the house.
